item.description:
This is a sacred time to be alive! The New Age is upon us and it is one of vision & enlightenment. What will be your contribution? How you can realistically be part of changing the world to a brighter, more conscious place, right where you are. Connect with others who share your vision.
An interactive seminar presented by Master Teacher and Mystic, Mother Clare Watts, author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment.

The seminar will be followed by Satsang and Blessings with Mother Clare.

Cost: $25.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Bringing in the New Age
